mutants.code:
def largestRange(A, K):
    A = sorted(A)
    n = len(A)
    res = A[n - 1] + A[0]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        (a, b) = (A[i], A[i + 1])
        high = max(A[n - 1] - K, a + K)
        low = min(A[0] + K, b - K)
        res = min(res, high - low)
    return res

def largestRange(A, K):
    A = sorted(A)
    n = len(A)
    res = A[n - 1] * A[0]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        (a, b) = (A[i], A[i + 1])
        high = max(A[n - 1] - K, a + K)
        low = min(A[0] + K, b - K)
        res = min(res, high - low)
    return res

    A = sorted(A)
